tidbits.title: Independence Struggle
tidbits.description: Timor-Leste gained independence in 2002 after a long struggle for independence from Indonesian rule, marking a significant chapter in its history.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country has a diverse cultural landscape with various ethnic groups, each contributing unique languages, traditions, and customs to its rich heritage.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: Timor-Leste offers stunning landscapes, from pristine beaches along the coast to rugged mountains and lush forests, attracting nature enthusiasts and adventurers.
